title: MDEM Website Viewer Development
description: Statewide Mississippi – Web GIS Developer. Designed and developed a statewide Cadastral and Flood Web GIS Viewer for real-time access to geospatial data.
fullDetails: Built interactive mapping functionalities using ArcGIS JavaScript API, integrated Enterprise Geodatabase, and streamlined ArcGIS services.
Incorporated live data feeds from FEMA and state agencies for situational awareness.
Led testing, optimization, and conducted training for MDEM staff.

title: MDEM: Mississippi Contour Development (1ft & 2ft)
description: Project Lead for high-resolution contour dataset creation and topographic analysis.
fullDetails: Managed creation of high-resolution 1ft & 2ft contour datasets.
Applied advanced GIS techniques for precise topographic analysis.
Oversaw quality control through automated validation and manual inspections.
Coordinated team and stakeholder efforts for timely data delivery.

title: MDEM: Elevation Derived Hydrography Dataset (EDH)
description: Project Coordinator for hydrographic feature extraction and QA/QC management.
fullDetails: Coordinated hydrographic feature extraction using elevation data.
Led QA/QC efforts, integrating automated and manual checks.
Managed timelines, stakeholder communication, and team collaboration.

title: Watershed Planning Project, Mississippi
description: Web GIS Developer for public-facing hydrologic data visualization and stormwater management programs.
fullDetails: Developed a public-facing website using ArcGIS Online, Hub, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap to display hydrologic data.
Integrated communication tools for announcements, resource sharing, and public feedback.
Contributed to development of a Comprehensive Watershed-Based Stormwater Management Program for Bolivar and Sunflower Counties.

title: Stormwater Assessment and Management
description: GIS Consultant for automated impervious surface extraction and stormwater fee calculation.
fullDetails: Developed automated impervious surface extraction for stormwater fee calculation.
Created custom ArcGIS tool, authored technical and user documentation.
Built a web application using ArcGIS WebApp Builder for stakeholder access.

title: Town of Sardis & Crawford, Mississippi
description: GIS Consultant for utility geodatabase management and field survey applications.
fullDetails: Designed, developed, and managed utility geodatabases.
Created map book series with custom symbology and labeling.
Developed field survey data collection application using ArcGIS Online with ongoing technical support.

title: Water Treatment Plant Site Investigation Application
description: Web GIS Developer for water treatment issue tracking and workflow optimization.
fullDetails: Developed workflow and dashboard for tracking water treatment issues.
Integrated digital survey forms for efficient data collection.
Optimized workflow for project tracking and reporting.

title: DeSoto County Rural Broadband Connectivity Program
description: GIS Developer for broadband service location databases and field survey tracking.
fullDetails: Designed and maintained GIS databases for broadband service locations.
Converted datasets into GIS-compatible layers and published via ArcGIS Online/Server.
Developed dashboard to track field surveys and project status.

title: Public Works Department, City of Meridian
description: GIS Specialist for CAD-to-GIS automation and sewer network modeling.
fullDetails: Automated CAD-to-GIS conversion, spatial data QC, and sewer network modeling.
Developed digital survey forms for mobile/web platforms and dashboards for monitoring data and project status.

title: MDEM: National Hydrography Dataset (NHD)
description: GIS Developer for geodatabase design and automated stream extraction.
fullDetails: Designed geodatabase, processed and analyzed streams/waterbodies.
Performed spatial QC/QA and developed tools to automate stream extraction.

title: Machine Learning Vegetation Classification
description: Research Scientist applying SVM and Random Forest classification to UAS imagery.
fullDetails: Collected UAV imagery and generated orthomosaic multispectral maps.
Applied SVM and Random Forest classification to vegetation and land use.
Achieved 90% overall classification accuracy (Confusion Matrix).

title: 3D Shoreline Change Detection (JILONA)
description: Geospatial Analyst performing shoreline change detection after Hurricane Irma.
fullDetails: Extracted shoreline, coastline, and vegetation boundaries from UAV imagery.
Developed Python script for linear regression analysis to derive long- and short-term shoreline change rates (1953–2020).
Computed 2D distance changes and 3D volume erosion/accretion.

title: Watershed Master Plan, Florida State
description: Remote Sensing & GIS Researcher for groundwater modeling and flood inundation mapping.
fullDetails: Collected and integrated well data to create groundwater layers.
Applied overlay analysis to derive raster layers for flood modeling using CASCADE.
Developed Probability of Flood Inundation Maps; ensured quality against FEMA maps.

title: Find Nearby Places
description: GIS Developer for PostgreSQL/PostGIS spatial querying and QGIS visualization.
fullDetails: Built PostgreSQL/PostGIS database to query locations within a mile.
Developed maps in QGIS to visualize queried locations.

title: Crime Hotspot Analysis
description: GIS Developer for crime data aggregation and hotspot map publishing.
fullDetails: Developed web application with ArcGIS JS API, HTML, CSS.
Aggregated crime data, calculated densities, generated hotspot/cold spot maps, and published web layers.

title: High Speed 2 Rail Project
description: GIS Specialist for railway data integration and workflow automation.
fullDetails: Extracted, preprocessed, and integrated data from Excel into feature classes.
Automated workflows with Model Builder and Python scripts.

title: Transportation Planning
description: GIS Specialist for network analysis and spatial attribute extraction.
fullDetails: Converted nodes/links into GIS layers using Model Builder.
Conducted Origin-Destination route analysis with Network Analyst, applied restrictions, and extracted spatial attributes.

title: TPUP & Port of Liverpool, RIP Scheme
description: GIS Analyst for road improvement program land referencing and web mapping.
fullDetails: Processed OSM data, designed Model Builder tools for land referencing, labeling, numbering, and map documentation.
Created MXD, published as service, and developed web maps/apps for client decision-making.

title: Wessex CP6
description: GIS Specialist for asset mapping and automated map production.
fullDetails: Managed locational data, collected base maps, automated map production with Python notebooks, and used Collector App.

title: Skip Pool Improvement Scheme
description: GIS Specialist for geological and groundwater flooding risk mapping.
fullDetails: Migrated A585 layer, produced geological maps for superficial deposits, aquifers, and groundwater flooding.

title: West Bengal Minor Irrigation Project
description: Remote Sensing Analyst for long-term LULC classification and yield estimation.
fullDetails: Conducted digital image analysis, developed 10+ years of LULC and crop classification, performed change detection, and estimated yields.

title: Environmental Impact Assessment of Mining Area
description: Remote Sensing Analyst mapping mining spatial coverage and ecological impact.
fullDetails: Processed LISS-4 satellite data, mapped land use/land cover, calculated mining spatial coverage, and visualized affected regions.

title: Texture Driven Regional Based Data Analysis
description: Remote Sensing Analyst applying image segmentation and SVM classification.
fullDetails: Designed image segmentation techniques, applied SVM classification, and performed post-classification change detection in South Chennai.
